DataList.LocalizeJP: ブル～～アーカイブッ！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Blue~ Archive!

DataList.LocalizeKR:
수행부의 마스코트, 빠밤! 하고 등장!
기다렸지. 선생님! 그럼 오늘은 뭘 하고 놀까?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
修行部のマスコット、ババンと登場！
お待たせ先生！で、今日は何しよっか？
DataList.LocalizeEN:
It's time for the mascot of discipline club!
 Sorry for keep you waiting, Sensei!
What are we going to do today?

DataList.LocalizeJP:
ふぁ、ねむ……
目が、もう……
んむ……
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Ha~, Im' sleepy...
My eyes are already... zzz...

DataList.LocalizeKR:
내 놀이전투력 측정에
따르면…! 이곳은
술래잡기에 최적인 장소…!
DataList.LocalizeJP:
私の測定によると……
ここは、鬼ごっこに
最適な場所！
DataList.LocalizeEN: According to my measurement, this place is perfect to play tag!

DataList.LocalizeJP:
ふんふん～♪
ねぇねぇ、
今日は何する？
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Hm~hm~♪
Hey Sensei, what are you doing today?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
멋진 레이디가 되기 위해선,
 휴식도 중요한 법…!
이라고 하는 걸 TV에서 봤어.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
素敵なレディーになる
ためには、休息も大切
……！って、
この間TVで見た！
DataList.LocalizeEN:
I saw on TV the other day that
In order to become a wonderful lady, taking a rest is also important...!

DataList.LocalizeKR:
츠바키 선배랑
미모리 선배.
지금쯤 뭘 하고 있으려나~
DataList.LocalizeJP:
ツバキ先輩と
ミモリ先輩
今は何してるのかな～
DataList.LocalizeEN: I wonder what Tsubaki and Mimori-senpai are doing?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
앗, 선생님!
계속 기다렸어!
오늘은 뭐하고 놀까?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
あっ、先生！
待ってた待ってた！
今日は何をする？
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Ah, Sensei!
I've been waiting for you, I've been waiting for you!
What are we doing to day?

DataList.LocalizeJP:
先生遅い！
もう『ムシクィーン』
始まっちゃうよ！？
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Sensei, why are you late!
Mushi queen is already starting!?

DataList.LocalizeJP: 今日は何をして……
DataList.LocalizeEN: What are we playing...

DataList.LocalizeJP: も、もちろん宿題もやるけど！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Of course, I will do my homework!

DataList.LocalizeKR:
멋진 레이디가 되기 위해,
매일매일 단련이 필수야!
DataList.LocalizeJP:
素敵なレディーになるためには、
毎日の鍛錬が必須！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Daily training is essential to become a wonderful lady!

DataList.LocalizeJP: え、鍛錬の内容？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Eh? What kind of training?

DataList.LocalizeJP:
今日はとりあえず、
縄跳び100回！
DataList.LocalizeEN: For now, jumping rope 100 times

DataList.LocalizeKR:
아, 선생님 알고 있어?
키보토스에는 정의의
히어로라는 게 있대!
DataList.LocalizeJP:
あ、先生知ってる？
キヴォトスにも正義の
ヒーローがいるんだって！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Sensei, do you know that there are heroes of justice in Kivotos too?

DataList.LocalizeJP:
たしか、カイテン……
何だっけ？
DataList.LocalizeEN: I think their name was Kaiten... What was it?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
응? 정의의 히어로가
아니야? 조금 달라?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
え、正義のヒーローじゃないの？
ちょっと違う？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Eh, they are not heroes of justice? They are a little different?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
…으-음, 뭔가 어른의
사정 같은 거야? 어렵네~
DataList.LocalizeJP:
……うーん、なんか大人の
事情があるの？難しいね。
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Uhm... You have adult problem?
I don't get it yet

DataList.LocalizeKR:
선생님은 오늘도 일이야?
일이라는 거, 그렇게 재밌어?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
先生は今日も仕事？
仕事って、そんなに面白い？
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Sensei, you have to work today too?
Is your job that interesting?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
…어? 선생님?
왜 그런 얼굴을 하는 거야?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
……え、先生？
何でそんな顔してるの？
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Eh, Sensei?
What happened?

DataList.LocalizeJP:
だ、大丈夫……！？
何かごめん……
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Are you alright?
I'm sorry...

DataList.LocalizeJP:
心配しないで、
私がいてあげるから！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Don't worry, I'm here with you!

DataList.LocalizeKR:
이것도 나중에 멋진 레이디가
되기 위한 훈련이니까.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
これも将来、立派なレディーに
なるための訓練だから
DataList.LocalizeEN: This is also training to become a splendid lady in the future.

DataList.LocalizeKR:
오늘은 내가
선생님의 비서가 되어줄게!
에헤헷! 기쁘지?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
今日は私が、
先生の秘書になってあげる！
えへへっ！嬉しい？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Today, I'll be Sensei's secretary! Eheheh! Are you happy?

DataList.LocalizeJP:
あっ、先生！
お誕生日おめでとう！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Happy birthday to you, Sensei!

DataList.LocalizeKR:
자, 여기! 오늘을 위해
준비한, 내 특제 생일 선물!
DataList.LocalizeJP:
はい！今日のために
用意した、私からの
特別な誕生日プレゼント！
DataList.LocalizeEN: This's a special birthday gift that I've been preparing for today!

DataList.LocalizeKR:
응? 내용물이 뭐냐고?
내가 저번에 잡은 매미야!
DataList.LocalizeJP:
え、中身？
私がこないだ捕まえたセミだよ！
DataList.LocalizeEN: What's inside? It's a cicada I caught the other day.

DataList.LocalizeJP: ほらほら、早く開けて！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Hurry, open it!

DataList.LocalizeJP: え、お誕生日？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Eh? My birthday?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
응, 고마워- 선생님!
이걸로 나도 멋진 레이디에
한 걸음 더 가까워졌을까?
DataList.LocalizeJP:
うん、ありがとー先生！
これで私も、立派なレディに
また一歩近付いたかな？
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Thank you, Sensei!
With this do you think I'm one step closer to becoming a fine lady?

DataList.LocalizeJP: そうだと良いなっ！
DataList.LocalizeEN: I hope so!

DataList.LocalizeJP: あけましておめでとう、先生！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Happy New Year, Sensei!

DataList.LocalizeJP:
え、お年玉くれるの？
本当に？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Are you giving me New Year's allowance?

DataList.LocalizeJP: やったーー！先生大好き！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Yeah! I love you, Sensei!

DataList.LocalizeKR:
메리 크리스마스~!
츠바키 선배랑 미모리
선배를 불러서.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
メリークリスマ～ス！
ツバキ先輩とミモリ先輩を呼んで
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Merry Christmas!
Can you call Tsubaki and Mimori senpai for me?

DataList.LocalizeKR:
다 같이 파티를 하자!
빨리 치킨 먹고 싶어~!
DataList.LocalizeJP:
みんなでパーティーしよ！
早くチキン食べたい！
DataList.LocalizeEN:
We will have a party!
I want to eat fried chicken as soon as possible!

DataList.LocalizeKR:
저번에, TV에서 봤는데….
할로윈이라는 건,
제과 회사의 음모래!
DataList.LocalizeJP:
この間、TVで見たんだけど……
ハロウィンって、お菓子メーカー
の陰謀なんだって！
DataList.LocalizeEN:
I saw it on TV the other day...
Halloween is a candy maker's conspiracy!

DataList.LocalizeKR:
순수한 꿈을 이용하다니!
용서할 수 없어!
단호하게 반대야!
DataList.LocalizeJP:
純粋な夢を利用するなんて
許せない！断固反対！
DataList.LocalizeEN:
I can't allow them to take advantage of pure dreams!
I'm dead set against that!

DataList.LocalizeJP:
……え？このお菓子、
私にくれるの？
DataList.LocalizeEN: Eh? Are you giving me candy?

DataList.LocalizeJP:
やったー！
えへへっ、ありがと！
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Yeah~!
Ehehe, thank you!

DataList.LocalizeKR:
우오- 멋있어…. 헤에…. 오오….
와아…. 이거, 혹시 더 강해질 수
있는 거야? 아하핫,
나, 더욱더 파워업해버릴 것 같아!
선생님, 고마워-!
DataList.LocalizeJP:
うぉー、カッコイイ……へえ……おお……
わぁ……これ、もしかしてもっと
強くなれるやつ？あははっ！
私、さらにパワーアップしちゃいそう！
先生、ありがとー！
DataList.LocalizeEN:
Wow, cool... hee... oh... wow...
Is this something that can make me stronger?
Ahaha! I'm going to power up even more!
Thank you, Sensei!

DataList.LocalizeJP: ……ふふっ。
DataList.LocalizeEN: Fufu~

DataList.LocalizeKR:
왠지 오늘은,
어-엄청 많은 일들이 있었네.
DataList.LocalizeJP:
なんだか今日は、
色んな事があったなー。
DataList.LocalizeEN: Somehow, a lot of things happened today...

DataList.LocalizeJP:
色々バタバタの
一日だったけど……。
DataList.LocalizeEN: It was a busy day...

DataList.LocalizeKR:
오늘 선생님 덕분에,
또 한 걸음. 멋진 레이디에
가까워졌을지도?!
DataList.LocalizeJP:
先生のおかげで、
また一歩立派なレディーに
近付けたかも！？
DataList.LocalizeEN: But thanks to Sensei, I got closer to becoming a wonderful lady!?

DataList.LocalizeJP: ありがとね、先生！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Thank you, Sensei

DataList.LocalizeJP:
いつも私のこと、
手伝ってくれて！
DataList.LocalizeEN: For always helping me!

DataList.LocalizeJP: 本当！？やった！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Really? Yay~

DataList.LocalizeKR:
그럼 이 기쁜 마음을
듬뿍 담아, 선생님한테
공격이야!
DataList.LocalizeJP:
じゃあこの嬉しい気持ちを
込めて……先生に攻撃！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Then I will attack you with this happy feeling!

DataList.LocalizeJP:
くらえ、「ドリルホーンの
ウサギ・究極体」の
ドリルインパクトー！！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Take this! Drill Impact of Drillhorn Rabbit's Ultimate Form!

DataList.LocalizeJP: にひひっ！
DataList.LocalizeEN: Nihihi!
